column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Rod - Thanks for your review. I'm sorry you didn't enjoy our ramen. To help us improve our station
column2: can you tell me which ramen you ordered? We're never going to be all things to all people
column3: but if customers are unhappy with their meals we can only help them if they mention something to their server or the manager-on-duty. Moreover
column4: it's a little unfair to judge our entire operation on one item (based on your review).
